name: Padilla - Italia - Toro
additionalNotes: Padilla is a boutique value brand handcrafted in Honduras and Nicaragua. Cigar lovers gravitate to Padilla for its popular portfolio of inexpensive blends. The brand is crafted in small batches from premium tobaccos at rock-bottom prices. Discover Padilla’s finest offerings for pennies on the dollar when you're in search of a reliable brand to puff on while you're mowing the yard or shoveling snow. Aficionados constantly applaud Holt’s for the cheap, sub-wholesale prices applied to their favorite Padilla blends. A top contender in bargain bins across the country, Padilla is the perfect option when you need to stock up on a consistent cigar variety for an ultra-low everyday price.
